front.title: IEEE Standards Interpretations for IEEE Std 1003.2-1992

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: The Portable Applications Standards Committee of the IEEE Computer Society carried out a series of analyses of various problems encountered by users of IEEE Std 1003.2-1992, IEEE Standard for Information Technology - Portable Operating System Interface (POSIX)- Part 2: Shell and Utilities. The results of its deliberations are presented in this document. The intent is to give the POSIX community reasonable ways of interpreting unclear portions of the standard.
